body:
Hi guys! Im sending emails to support avicus, but nothing... 1 week and nothing, so i decide to do a post here! Im going to explain all .
I got 2 "BAN" One for Suspect KillAura and, a mod see the video and i dont have it kill aura, and the second ban is for suspect ClickImbot, and i want to see video report or photos, because, i dont use hacks, i hate it... im very good at pvp 1vs1 and i have a good team!
Please... what i have to do? 

Put ur opinion in a reply...!

Sorry for my english!

title: I got wrong ban!

replies.body:
You can resend an email at support@avicus.net
Creating multiple forum posts regarding your infractions will harm your chances of being appealed.
replies.body_tagged:
You can resend an email at support@avicus.net
Creating multiple forum posts regarding your infractions will harm your chances of being appealed.

replies.body:
If your email has not been replied to in about a week, I'd recommend you appeal again. Emails can be easily lost.

Staff members will not pardon you due to a forum post. It's how the system here works.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
You have received 3 infractions for hacking, chances are at least 1 of them was right.

E-mail support@avicus.net to appeal, or contact a manager on Skype.
replies.body_tagged:
You have received 3 infractions for hacking, chances are at least 1 of them was right.

E-mail support@avicus.net to appeal, or contact a manager on Skype.

replies.body: Staff only bans if they have complete proof of you hacking. Therefor, you were hacking.
replies.body_tagged: Staff only bans if they have complete proof of you hacking. Therefor, you were hacking.

replies.body: The staff can't just ban you on the spot with no proof unless they saw you in game. So just get Gill's or Ben's Skype and ask if they have proof of you hacking. If they saw you hacking in game that could just be a mistake. But now if they proof they can ban you on the spot once they see it. So I would just ask them for the proof...
